channel.title: Idea
channel.description:
So i have an idea and before i start if this s not the right section tell me what section plz so i was thinking a player can go on there frend list and there will be an option saying teleport to player when they right click it so when they click on it the other player will get an interface saying accept or decline and if the player click acept that other player will be teleported to theam unless they are in a mini game the wilderness or dungernerring or they decline it
Post ways i could improve it and if you would like a tutorial when i put it into my sever
